#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
cin.tie(0);
cout.tie(0);
long long t;
cin>>t;
while(t--)
{
  string s;
  cin>>s;
  long long count = 0;
  for(long long i = 0;i<s.length();i++)
  {
   if(s[i] == 'a' || s[i] == 'e' || s[i] == 'i' || s[i] == 'o' || s[i] == 'u')
    {
     count++;
     break;
    }
  }
  if(count>0)
  cout<<"yes\n"; 
  else 
  cout<<"no\n";
}
}
